ygData.subject: Re: Blade Molds - possible spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry but I don t have any clue either however if you do find out, I would definetely like to know
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry but I don't have any clue either however if you do find out, I
would definetely like to know




At 05:57 AM 7/21/99 PDT, you wrote:
>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
>I've asked this time and time again, yet no one seems to know exactly what
>these are for - blade molds. Specifically the ones that are stackable that
>you get from the same NPC's you talk to to initiate the Screaming Mace
>Quest. I have theories as to what these molds are for, but would like to
>know if anyone out there knows for sure
>
